info.description:
golfing [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/ldyXWw[/url] (435 chars)
could it be smaller ? :-)

reproducing [url]https://twitter.com/CPriestman/status/684874950944100352/photo/1[/url]
info.name: escher-like 2 ( 313 chars)

renderpass.code:
// golfing https://shadertoy.com/view/ldyXWw (435 chars)
// reproducing https://twitter.com/CPriestman/status/684874950944100352/photo/1

// --- -16 ch by Coyote; -2 by Fab. Now pretty obfuscated :-p

#define r    mat2( cos( vec4(0,11,33,0) + 1.57*                      //
#define c(m) clamp( mod( m+ iTime -.3*( V = ceil(r.8)) * U/3.16 -.5 ) ) -V.y, 6.) -4., 0.,1.).x//
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 u) { O*=0.;
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy, V,
	     U = u+u - R;
    if ( abs( U *= 7.5/R.y ).x < 7.5 )
        U += 3.,
        U = abs( r( c() == 0. ? R=-R, U.y++, ++U, -c(3.) : c() ) ))
                *( U - r-.8)) * V*3.16 ) ) -.5,
        O += .5 - R.y/30. * max( V = U.y < U.x ? U.yx : U, --V.y ).x;
}/*





// --- 331 chars

#define r(t)   mat2( cos( 1.57*t + vec4(0,11,33,0)) )              //
#define c(U,m) clamp( mod( m+ iTime -.3*( V = ceil( r(.8) * (U)/3.16 -.5 ) ) -V.y, 6.) -4., 0.,1.) //
#define mainImage(O,u)                                              \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy, V,                                     \
	     U = 7.5* (u+u-R) / R.y, t;                                 \
    if ( abs(U.x) < 7.5 )                                           \
        t = c( U += 3. , ),                                         \
        U = abs( r( ( t.x == 0. ? R=-R, U.y++, -c(++U,3.) : t ).x ) \
                *( U - r(-.8) * V*3.16 ) ) -.5,                     \
        U.y < U.x ? U = U.yx : U,                                   \
        O += .5 - R.y/30. *  max( U.x, --U.y )                     /*
            
            
            
            

// --- 333 chars

#define r(t)     mat2( cos( 1.57*t + vec4(0,11,33,0)) )            //
#define c(U,m) ( V = ceil( r(.8) * (U)/3.16 -.5 ),                  \
                 clamp( mod( m+ iTime -V.y-.3*V, 6.) -4., 0.,1.)    \
               )                                                   //
#define mainImage(O,u)                                              \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy, V,                                     \
	     U = 7.5* (u+u-R) / R.y, t;                                 \
    if ( abs(U.x) < 7.5 )                                           \
        t = c( U += 3. , ),                                         \
        U = abs( r( ( t.x == 0. ? R=-R, U.y++, -c(++U,3.) : t ).x ) \
                *( U - r(-.8) * V*3.16 ) ) -.5,                     \
        U.y < U.x ? U = U.yx : U,                                   \
        O += .5 - R.y/30. *  max( U.x, --U.y )                     /*
            
            
            
            

// --- 337 chars

#define R(t)     mat2( cos( 1.57*t + vec4(0,11,33,0)) )        //
#define C(U,m) ( V = ceil( R(.8) * (U)/3.16 -.5 ),              \
                 clamp( mod( m+ iTime -V.y-.3*V, 6.) -4., 0.,1.)\
               )                                               //
#define mainImage(O,u)                                          \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy, V,                                 \
	     U = 7.5* (u+u-R) / R.y, t;                             \
    if ( abs(U.x) < 7.5 )                                       \
        t = C( U += 3. , ),                                     \
        t.x == 0. ? R=-R, U.y++, t = - C( ++U , 3. ) : t,       \
        U = abs( R(t.x) * ( U - R(-.8) * V*3.16 ) ),            \
        U.y < U.x ? U = U.yx : U,                               \
        O += .5 - R.y/30. *  max( U.x-.5, U.y-1.5 )            /*

            
            
            
            
// --- 341 chars

#define R(t)     mat2( cos( 1.57*t + vec4(0,11,33,0)) )      //
#define C(U,m) ( V = ceil( R(.8) * (U)/3.16 -.5 ),            \
    clamp( mod( m+iTime -V.y-.3*V.x, 6.) -4., 0.,1.)  )      //
#define mainImage(O,u)                                        \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy, V,                               \
	     U = 7.5* (u+u-R) / R.y;                              \
    float t;                                                  \
    if ( abs(U.x) < 7.5 )                                     \
        t = C( U += 3. , ),                                   \
        t == 0. ? R=-R, U.y++, t = - C( ++U , 3. ) : t,       \
        U = abs( R(t) * ( U - R(-.8) * V*3.16 ) ),            \
        U.y < U.x ? U = U.yx : U,                             \
        O += .5 - R.y/30. *  max( U.x-.5, U.y-1.5 )          /*

            
            
            
            
// --- 362 chars

#define R(t)     mat2(cos(t+vec4(0,11,33,0)))                //
#define C(U,m) ( V = ceil( R(1.25) * (U)/k -.5 ),             \
    clamp( mod( m+iTime -V.y-.3*V.x, 6.) -4., 0.,1.) *1.57 ) //
#define mainImage(O,u)                                        \
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy, V,                               \
	     U = 7.5* (u+u-R) / R.y;                              \
    float t,s, k = 3.16;                                      \
    if ( abs(U.x) < 7.5 )                                     \
        s = t = C( U += 3. , ),                               \
        t > 0. ? t : t = - C( U += vec2(1,2) , 3. ),          \
        U = abs( R(t)* ( U - R(-1.25)*V*k ) ),                \
        U.y < U.x ? U = U.yx : U,                             \
        O += .5 - R.y/30.* ( max( U.x, U.y-1. ) -.5 ) ,       \
        s > 0. ? O : O = 1.-O                                /*

/**/
renderpass.name: Image
